entry.title: Episode 3: ExpressionEngine StackExchange
entry.content:
ExpressionEngine Pro Anna Brown and Testing Hero Chris Hartjes join Ben Edmunds and Phil Sturgeon to discuss the recent rumblings in the ExpressionEngine community and the new EE StackExchange site. We talk about Inversion of Control (IoC), what it is, why its useful and how it’s done.

We also talk a little bit about how PHP has been (and is continuing) to move towards a post-framework world thanks to independant framework-agnostic components - and of course we talk with Chris about unit-testing.

  • ExpressionEngine StackExchange
  • /dev/hell Postcast
  • The Grumpy Programmer’s Guide To Building Testable PHP Applications
  • Laravel 4 - IoC Controller Injection & Unit Testing
  • So You Want To Write Tests

entry.title: Episode 1 - Composer kicks ass, Laravel 4 is coming, and PHP Hosting sucks - guest Taylor Otwell
entry.content: In the first episode of the PHP Town Hall podcast, Phil Sturgeon and Ben Edmunds rant about how awesome Composer is; chat with Taylor Otwell about the upcoming Laravel 4 release; and whine about how horrible PHP PAAS hosting is.
